text: Taming of the Fire () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Daniil Khrabrovitsky.Фестиваль кино о космосе "Циолковский" в Калуге объединит свыше 80 фильмовУКРОЩЕНИЕ ОГНЯ (1972) It stars Kirill Lavrov, Ada Rogovtseva, and Igor Gorbachev. ==Actors== *Kirill Lavrov as Andrei Bashkirtsev *Ada Rogovtseva as Natalia Bashkirtseva *Igor Gorbachev as Ognev *Andrei Popov as Gromov *Igor Vladimirov as General Anatoly Golovin, Chairman of the State Commission *Innokenti Smoktunovsky as Konstantin Tsiolkovsky *Petr Shelokhonov as Mikhail Karelin *Svetlana Korkoshko as Zoya Konstantinova *Vsevolod Safonov as Leonid Sretensky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1972 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Taming of the Fire
